Set of messages 1.Message: Hello! How are you feeling? If you are feeling overwhelmed or stressed, here is a short activity that can help when you are feeling like needing some more support to get through the day.

Video.Text: Here's a video to help you get through the day!

Set of messages 2.Message: If you ever need additional support to help you cope with any stress or other emotional difficulties, type "Help". Chat to you later!
